description: This file defines a React component for a Transactions page in a personal finance tracker application. It manages filters, fetches transaction data from an API, displays transactions in a table, and handles deletion of transactions with confirmation.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetches transaction data from the ExpensesAPI based on current filters and updates the component state.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a selected transaction via ExpensesAPI and refreshes the data.
